sentences.en: After her mother's death, she became acutely aware of her own mortality.
sentences.cn: 她母亲去世后，她开始强烈意识到自己的生命是有限的。

sentences.en: All the while I was acutely aware of her nearness.
sentences.cn: 我一直强烈地意识到她离我很近.

sentences.en: He felt acutely embarrassed at being the centre of attention.
sentences.cn: 成为大家注意的焦点使他感到非常不自然.

sentences.en: He was acutely aware of the odour of cooking oil.
sentences.cn: 他闻到一股浓浓的油烟味。

sentences.en: I am acutely aware of the difficulties we face.
sentences.cn: 我十分清楚我们面临的困难。

sentences.en: I am acutely aware of the difficulties we face.
sentences.cn: 我十分清楚我们面临的困难.

sentences.en: It then inhibited their speech and made them acutely uneasy.
sentences.cn: 这样一来他们就说不了话,憋得难受.

sentences.en: It was acutely embarrassing for us all.
sentences.cn: 这让我们全体感到非常尴尬.

sentences.en: It was an acutely uncomfortable journey back to London.
sentences.cn: 那是一次极其痛苦的返回伦敦的旅行。

sentences.en: It's important to become acutely aware of how your eating ties in with your stress level.
sentences.cn: 重要的是要深刻意识到饮食和压力之间的紧密关系。

sentences.en: She was acutely aware of the noise of the city.
Students are becoming acutely aware that they need more than just paper qualifications.
sentences.cn: 学生越来越强烈地意识到他们需要的不仅是一纸文凭。

sentences.en: They were acutely aware of the difficulties.
sentences.cn: 他们强烈地感到种种困难.

sentences.en: Those tensions have been felt most acutely by women.
sentences.cn: 最能深切感受到这种紧张氛围的是女性。

sentences.en: We continue to conduct tests, but increasingly, we conduct long conversations with her, acutely aware that our creation will raise many ethical questions on the part of the public.
sentences.cn: 我们将继续进行测试，但越来越多地，随着长时间的交谈，我们敏锐地意识到，我们的作品将在公众当中引起许多道德问题。

sentences.en: Your food, water, and sanitary facilities are acutely substandard.
sentences.cn: 你们的食物, 水和卫生设备都比一般标准低得多.

sentences.en: Your partner can feel the loss as acutely as you, but may feel that it is unmanly to cry.
sentences.cn: 你的搭档跟你一样极度地失落，但他也许会觉得男儿有泪不轻弹。

words.tran_cn: 严重的，[医] 急性的；敏锐的；激烈的；尖声的

trans.tran_en: feeling or noticing something very strongly
